```{r}
source("setup.R")
```

```{r}
data("knz_bison")
?knz_bison

knz_bisonmutate <- knz_bison %>%
  mutate(age = rec_year - animal_yob)
```

```{r}
bison_function <- function(n) {
  knz_bisonmutate %>%
    filter(animal_weight == n)
}

weight <- bison_function(890)
```

```{r}
knz_bisonmutate %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = animal_sex, y = animal_weight)) +
  geom_boxplot()

knz_bisonmutate %>%
  drop_na(animal_weight) %>%
  t.test(animal_sex ~ animal_weight, var.equal = FALSE, detailed = TRUE) 
```
